00022 #include <fcntl.h>
00023 #include <stddef.h>
00024 #include <stdio.h>
00025 #include <stdint.h>
00026 #include <stdlib.h>
00027 #include <string.h>
00028 #include <unistd.h>
00029 
00030 #include <ccn/charbuf.h>
00031 #include <ccn/coding.h>
00032 #include <ccn/ccn.h>
00033 
00034 #define CCNBX_OPT_UNADORNED 1
00035 #define CCNBX_OPT_VERBOSE   2
00036 
00037 static void
00038 usage(const char *progname)
00039 {
00040     fprintf(stderr,
00041             "usage: %s [-h] [-u] file selector\n"
00042             " Utility to extract a field from ccn binary encoded data.\n"
00043             "  selector is an element name\n"
00044             "  -d      data only - no element tags\n"
00045             "  -v      verbose\n"
00046             " use - for file to specify stdin\n"
00047             " result is on stdout\n",
00048             progname);
00049     exit(1);
00050 }
00051 
00052 
00053 static int
00054 dtag_lookup(const char *key)
00055 {
00056     const struct ccn_dict_entry *dict = ccn_dtag_dict.dict;
00057     int n = ccn_dtag_dict.count;
00058     int i;
00059     for (i = 0; i < n; i++)
00060         if (0 == strcmp(key, dict[i].name))
00061             return (dict[i].index);
00062     return (-1);
00063 }
00064 
00065 static int
00066 ccnbx(const char *path, const char *selector, int opt) {
00067     struct ccn_skeleton_decoder skel_decoder = {0};
00068     struct ccn_skeleton_decoder *d = &skel_decoder;
00069     struct ccn_charbuf *c = NULL;
00070     int fd = 0;
00071     int status = 1;
00072     int dtag;
00073     ssize_t res;
00074     ssize_t s;
00075     size_t offset = 0;
00076     size_t start = 0;
00077     size_t end = ~0U;
00078     int verbose = (opt & CCNBX_OPT_VERBOSE) != 0;
00079         
00080     if (0 != strcmp(path, "-")) {
00081         fd = open(path, O_RDONLY);
00082         if (-1 == fd) {
00083             perror(path);
00084             return(1);
00085         }
00086     }
00087     dtag = dtag_lookup(selector);
00088     if (dtag == -1) {
00089         fprintf(stderr, "%s is not a DTAG\n", selector);
00090         goto Finish;
00091     }
00092     c = ccn_charbuf_create();
00093     d->state |= CCN_DSTATE_PAUSE;
00094     do {
00095         ccn_charbuf_reserve(c, 512);
00096         res = read(fd, c->buf + c->length, c->limit - c->length);
00097         if (res < 0) {
00098             perror(path);
00099             goto Finish;
00100         }
00101         if (res == 0) {
00102             fprintf(stderr, "premature end of file on %s\n", path);
00103             goto Finish;
00104         }
00105         c->length += res;
00106         while (d->index < c->length) {
00107             s = ccn_skeleton_decode(d, c->buf + d->index, c->length - d->index);
00108             offset += s;
00109             if (verbose) fprintf(stderr, "%d, ", (int)s);
00110             if (d->state < 0) {
00111                 fprintf(stderr, "error state %d after %d chars from %s\n",
00112                         (int)d->state, (int)(d->index), path);
00113                 goto Finish;
00114             }
00115             if (s == 0 || CCN_FINAL_DSTATE(d->state))
00116                 break;
00117             if (CCN_GET_TT_FROM_DSTATE(d->state) == CCN_DTAG &&
00118                 d->numval == dtag) {
00119                 if (verbose)
00120                     fprintf(stderr, "(%s starts at %d, level is %d) ",
00121                             selector,
00122                             (int)d->token_index,
00123                             (int)d->nest);
00124                 start = d->token_index;
00125                 d->nest = 1;
00126                 if ((opt & CCNBX_OPT_UNADORNED) == 0)
00127                     d->state &= ~CCN_DSTATE_PAUSE; /* full speed to the end */                   
00128                 else
00129                     start = end = d->index; /* in case of no data */
00130                 status = 0;
00131             }
00132             else if (status == 0 && d->nest == 1 &&
00133                      (CCN_GET_TT_FROM_DSTATE(d->state) == CCN_UDATA ||
00134                       CCN_GET_TT_FROM_DSTATE(d->state) == CCN_BLOB)) {
00135                 /** @bug This would be confused by attributes */
00136                 start = d->index;
00137                 end = d->index + d->numval;
00138                 d->state &= ~CCN_DSTATE_PAUSE;
00139             }
00140         } 
00141     } while (!CCN_FINAL_DSTATE(d->state));
00142     if (verbose) fprintf(stderr, "complete element after %lu chars from %s\n",
00143                          (unsigned long)offset, path);
00144     if (offset < end)
00145         end = offset;
00146     if (status == 0)
00147         res = write(1, c->buf + start, end - start);
00148 Finish:
00149     ccn_charbuf_destroy(&c);
00150     close(fd);
00151     return(status);
00152 }
00153 
00154 int
00155 main(int argc, char **argv)
00156 {
00157     int c;
00158     int status = 0;
00159     int opt = 0;
00160 
00161     while ((c = getopt(argc, argv, "dhv")) != -1) {
00162         switch (c) {
00163         case 'd':
00164             opt |= CCNBX_OPT_UNADORNED;
00165             break;
00166         case 'v':
00167             opt |= CCNBX_OPT_VERBOSE;
00168             break;
00169         case 'h':
00170         default:
00171             usage(argv[0]);
00172             break;
00173         }
00174     }
00175     if (argv[optind] == NULL || argv[optind + 1] == NULL) {
00176         fprintf(stderr, "Too few arguments\n");
00177         usage(argv[0]);
00178     }
00179     if (argv[optind + 2] != NULL) {
00180         fprintf(stderr, "Too many arguments\n");
00181         usage(argv[0]);
00182     }
00183     status = ccnbx(argv[optind], argv[optind + 1], opt);
00184     return(status);
00185 }
